newsArray.title: After Under-19 cricket glory, Kanishk get hero‚Äôs welcome on home turf in Haryana‚Äôs Jhajjar
newsArray.description: Kanishk Chauhan, a member of India's U-19 World Cup-winning team, was celebrated in his ancestral village. He credited the team for the victory and encouraged youth to avoid drugs. His family and coach expressed pride, anticipating his future success in IPL and senior international cricket. Kanishk contributed significantly in the final match.
creator: ravinder saini

newsArray.title: Acceptance is key to success, says umpire Anantha Padmanabhan
newsArray.description: New Delhi, Feb 9 (PTI) Having been a bowler in his playing days, Anantha Padmanabhan had a natural tendency to rule against the batter when he first made the transition into umpiring, continuing an alliance that has now spanned 40 years. The 57-year-old Padmanabhan, a former first-class leg-spinner from Kerala, is now a distinguished umpire [...]

newsArray.title: Blidworth CWCC teen picked for Dubai cricket tour
newsArray.description: Blidworth Colliery Welfare Cricket Club player Harriet Vella is set to head to Dubai this month after being selected for a Lincolnshire County Cricket Club tour, a significant step in a journey that began with junior cricket at the village club when she was six.
creator: kyle kirkland
